humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one out of 23 lymph nodes examined is positive for metastatic carcinoma (1/23). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because there is metastatic carcinoma involving one lymph node (1/1), with a metastatic focus measuring 3.0 cm in greatest diameter and extracapsular extension identified measuring 0.2 x. Additionally, 22 lymph nodes were examined and found to be negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/22).
